## Checklist

- [ ] Metadata file is complete and valid JSON
- [ ] Patch file is included or external URL is provided
- [ ] Images (box art/banner) are accessible
- [ ] No copyright violations (original work or properly licensed)
- [ ] Tested and working with specified base ROM
- [ ] All links are valid and accessible
